failure.message:
`cy.request()` failed on:
https://qc-test.atmatech.id/api/me/
The response we received from your web server was:
> 400: Bad Request
This was considered a failure because the status code was not `2xx` or `3xx`.
If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false`
-----------------------------------------------------------
The request we sent was:
Method: PUT URL: https://qc-test.atmatech.id/api/me/ Headers: { "Connection": "keep-alive", "Authorization": "Bearer eyJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9.eyJleHAiOjE2OTk2MDYwNDMsImlkIjoiNjRlYzY3Nzc2NmFlMGZhMDBkZDY4NjkzIiwicm9sZSI6InN1cGVyYWRtaW4ifQ.i112nFwtpcphfGiRQcTkn_AkuNHOandqOQdeUeTBSbo", "user-agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Cypress/13.5.0 Chrome/114.0.5735.289 Electron/25.8.4 Safari/537.36", "accept": "*/*", "accept-encoding": "gzip, deflate", "content-type": "application/json", "content-length": 55 } Body: {"fullName":"Super Admin","email":"new@superadmin.com"}
-----------------------------------------------------------
The response we got was:
Status: 400 - Bad Request Headers: { "date": "Fri, 10 Nov 2023 08:17:24 GMT", "content-type": "application/json; charset=UTF-8", "content-length": "42", "connection": "keep-alive", "vary": "Origin", "cf-cache-status": "DYNAMIC", "report-to": "{\"endpoints\":[{\"url\":\"https:\\/\\/a.nel.cloudflare.com\\/report\\/v3?s=NRLv5vBBVqi%2F9e1z9hsydOU8E0%2F1Az%2BLHGHwU1TtoEMv1J2EjEgMPCN23XAzJwX7yApAmp9RiV2t1ckle1oOBOmxFL2VUmKyUEHpgrG9Yn3QzKByXpeJG127LndFoPp2x6I6NdCZ\"}],\"group\":\"cf-nel\",\"max_age\":604800}", "nel": "{\"success_fraction\":0,\"report_to\":\"cf-nel\",\"max_age\":604800}", "server": "cloudflare", "cf-ray": "823cdbe04c24bea7-CGK", "alt-svc": "h3=\":443\"; ma=86400" } Body: { "message": "Tidak ada data yang diubah." }
